com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.crypto

Interface TransactionSigner

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface TransactionSigner
    Functional interface for lambdas which can sign and return a transaction.
    See Also:
    Client.setOperatorWith(AccountId, PublicKey, TransactionSigner), Transaction.signWith(PublicKey, TransactionSigner)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] signTransaction(byte[] transactionBytes)
      Sign the transaction.

    • Method Detail

      • signTransaction

        byte[] signTransaction(byte[] transactionBytes)
        Sign the transaction. The implementation may block, e.g. while waiting for user confirmation. The kind of signature this callback returns is interpreted based on the kind of PublicKey passed alongside this signer.
        Parameters:
        transactionBytes - the bytes of the transaction body.
        Returns:
        the signature.
